About Aquanova Condos at Lakeview Village

Welcome to Aquanova Condos, situated within the visionary Lakeview Village — Mississaugas first master-planned waterfront community! Spanning 177 acres along the citys scenic shoreline, Lakeview Village will feature approximately 16,000 new homes, over 200,000 sq. ft. of retail and dining space, 9,000 long-term jobs, 1.9 million sq. ft. dedicated to office and employment space, and 10,12 acres set aside for campus, cultural, and innovation hubs. Aquanova Condos is among the first releases in this transformative community, offering a rare opportunity to live, work, and play in one connected and vibrant neighborhood. Whether youre an investor or looking for your dream home, this is a chance you wont want to miss.ct.

Why Invest in Aquanova

Aquanova Condos presents a prime opportunity for both smart investors and homebuyers seeking pre-construction properties in Mississauga. With limited housing supply, strong rental demand, and major infrastructure developments underway, Aquanova stands out as a rare and promising real estate investment.

Rapidly Developing Area: Located in the heart of Lakeview Village, a bold and transformative waterfront community. High Return on Investment: Steps from GO Transit, the waterfront, and mixed-use amenities, boosting long-term value. Consistently Low Vacancy Rates: Perfect for generating reliable rental income, whether short- or long-term. Positioned for Future Growth: Close to the upcoming Innovation District, expected to attract major tech and creative industries. Sustainable Living:Features energy-efficient design and a commitment to green building practices.

Quick Facts

  • Developer:Greenpark Homes
  • Architect:Sasaki Associates Inc.
  • Building Type: Condominium
  • Ownership: Condominium
  • Building Status: Pre-construction
  • Selling Status: Coming Soon
  • Storeys:43
  • Suite Type: 1 – 3
  • Suite Size: 450 – 1,172 sq.ft
  • Bed: 1 – 3 Bedroom(s)

Greenpark has been a leader in homebuilding since 1967, continuously evolving to meet the changing needs of homeowners. With a legacy rooted in hard work and integrity, Greenpark has shaped the way homes are designed and built. Nearly six decades later, that legacy remains strong, earning the trust and pride of countless families who call Greenpark home.
